review:
It has been 5 months of  spine surgery but the recovery rate is very less till now 
I am here now for review checkup the doctor  suggested me for MRI  and nerve test  going for the test with lots of hope for getting cured  

Tsewang choden bhutia
I prepared everything to ask the doc and I got the answer for everything and I gained confidence to tackle the issue myself.He is avoiding painkillers which is a good sign.

It was good experience with Chennai Apollo for doctor consultation though 90% discussion done with Assistant.

* I did not able to contact doctors assistant after my check up on last 6th Oct18 to know the dose of one tab. Please help me out. No one understood in Kolkata retail medicine stors.
